text: Conservatives sense a link between television and drugs, but they do not grasp the nature of this connection.
author: Christopher Lasch

text: A true man never frets about his place in the world, but just slides into it by the gravitation of his nature, and swings there as easily as a star.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

text: I've been very competitive by nature from a young age, whether it was eating a bowl of pasta faster than somebody else, or always wanting to be the first one in line.
author: Maria Sharapova

text: I believe that laughter is the best emotional Band-Aid in the world. It's like nature's Neosporin.
author: Matt LeBlanc

text: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
author: Lindsay Lohan
